name: VR Traffic Race
description:
Top endless racing game for the fans of traffic racing and driving simulations. VR Traffic Race is the best mobile racing game you have been looking for. Drive, drift and race in city traffic road! Highway traffic racing game offers you unique driving experience that you can choose your own racing style. Race at high speeds, drive against traffic and overtake cars! This highway speed car racer game is your best choice if you like fast racing and furious drift games.

Features:
- Very good and easy game play
- Fabulous background sound effects
- Limitless types of sports and stunt racing cars
- Realistic 3D amazing HD environments
- Smooth and realistic controls
- Accurate Physics And 3D animated graphics
- It’s totally free to play.
